name: Global uniques
unitUniques: [This Unit] gains the [Corrupted] promotion <upon entering a [All] tile> <for [All] units> <for [Warp Invasion] Civilizations>
[This Unit] gains the [Plague] promotion <upon entering a [All] tile> <for [Land] units> <for [Warp Invasion] Civilizations>
[This Unit] gains the [Wrath] promotion <upon entering a [All] tile> <for [Melee] units> <for [Warp Invasion] Civilizations>
[This Unit] gains the [Absolute Excess] promotion <upon entering a [All] tile> <for [All] units> <when number of [[Beacon of Darkness] Units] is more than [0]> <for [Warp Invasion] Civilizations>
[This Unit] loses the [Absolute Excess] promotion <upon entering a [All] tile> <for [All] units> <when number of [[Beacon of Darkness] Units] is less than [1]> <for [Warp Invasion] Civilizations>
[This Unit] takes [10] damage <upon entering a [Warp Invasion] tile> <for [non-[Warp Invasion]] units>
[This Unit] takes [10] damage <upon ending a turn in a [Warp Invasion] tile> <for [non-[Warp Invasion]] units>
[This Unit] heals [5] HP <upon ending a turn in a [Warp Invasion] tile> <for [Warp Invasion] units>
[+30]% XP required for promotions <for [Psychic Casting] units>
[This Unit] gains the [Untainted] promotion <upon entering a [All] tile> <for [All] units> <for [non-[Warp Invasion]] Civilizations>
